title: Exciting!
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Have you two seen the plans for the joint event yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah. It’s pretty good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Honoka, Chika, and Ayumu put it together, right? I’d say they did quite well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>This is just a guess, but.... I think Honoka and Chika just came up with whatever they wanted to do, and Ayumu was the one compiling them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>....That does seem highly likely.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ahaha.... But it sounds like an interesting project to take on, doesn’t it? Very exciting~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s a challenging one, so we need to make sure that we split the work equally.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s right. Mari, can I leave this part of the plan to Aqours? You guys are used to helping out events in Numazu, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! You can count on us♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Looks like we’re going to be busy from now on.... Let’s give this event our all, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
